name: Passerby (GameDeveloperGiraffe)
description:
Passerby is a short horror visual novel, You are just taking a walk who knows what you will passby. Recommended to download the game. 

  • The game has multiple endings, so you might not want to give up the first time you get a game over screen.
  • Use your mouse to traverse through the different choices in the game
  • Hope you have fun!
